verses.verse: וְאַתָּ֤ה <S%H859><s%> now you בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> Thou also son אָדָם֙ <S%H120><s%> of man קַח־ <S%H3947><s%> take לְךָ֣ לְבֵנָ֔ה <S%H3843><s%> thee a tile וְנָתַתָּ֥ה <S%H5414><s%> and lay אוֹתָ֖הּ <S%H853><s%> לְפָנֶ֑יךָ <S%H6440><s%> it before וְחַקּוֹתָ֥ <S%H2710><s%> thee and pourtray עָלֶ֛יהָ <S%H5921><s%> and עִ֖יר <S%H5892><s%> upon it the city אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְרוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <S%H3389><s%> [even] Jerusalem

וְנָתַתָּ֨ה <S%H5414><s%> And lay עָלֶ֜יהָ <S%H5921><s%> against מָצ֗וֹר <S%H4692><s%> siege וּבָנִ֤יתָ <S%H1129><s%> against it and build עָלֶ֙יהָ֙ <S%H5921><s%> against דָּיֵ֔ק <S%H1785><s%> a fort וְשָׁפַכְתָּ֥ <S%H8210><s%> against it and cast עָלֶ֖יהָ <S%H5921><s%> against סֹֽלְלָ֑ה <S%H5550><s%> a mount וְנָתַתָּ֨ה <S%H5414><s%> against it set עָלֶ֧יהָ <S%H5921><s%> against מַחֲנ֛וֹת <S%H4264><s%> the camp וְשִׂים־ <S%H7760><s%> also against it and set עָלֶ֥יהָ <S%H5921><s%> against כָּרִ֖ים <S%H3733><s%> [battering] rams סָבִֽיב׃ <S%H5439><s%> against it round about

וְאַתָּ֤ה <S%H859><s%> you קַח־ <S%H3947><s%> Moreover take לְךָ֙ מַחֲבַ֣ת <S%H4227><s%> pan בַּרְזֶ֔ל <S%H1270><s%> thou unto thee an iron וְנָתַתָּ֤ה <S%H5414><s%> and set אוֹתָהּ֙ <S%H853><s%> קִ֣יר <S%H7023><s%> it [for] a wall בַּרְזֶ֔ל <S%H1270><s%> of iron בֵּינְךָ֖ <S%H996><s%> between וּבֵ֣ין <S%H996><s%> between הָעִ֑יר <S%H5892><s%> between thee and the city וַהֲכִינֹתָה֩ <S%H3559><s%> and set אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> פָּנֶ֨יךָ <S%H6440><s%> thy face אֵלֶ֜יהָ <S%H413><s%> toward וְהָיְתָ֤ה <S%H1961><s%> is under בַמָּצוֹר֙ <S%H4692><s%> against it and it shall be besieged וְצַרְתָּ֣ <S%H6696><s%> and thou shalt lay siege עָלֶ֔יהָ <S%H5921><s%> is a א֥וֹת <S%H226><s%> against it This [shall be] a sign הִ֖יא <S%H1931><s%> This לְבֵ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> to the house יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel ס

וְאַתָּ֤ה <S%H859><s%> you שְׁכַב֙ <S%H7901><s%> Lie עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and צִדְּךָ֣ <S%H6654><s%> side הַשְּׂמָאלִ֔י <S%H8042><s%> thou also upon thy left וְשַׂמְתָּ֛ <S%H7760><s%> and lay אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֲוֹ֥ן <S%H5771><s%> the iniquity בֵּֽית־ <S%H1004><s%> of the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel עָלָ֑יו <S%H5921><s%> for מִסְפַּ֤ר <S%H4557><s%> upon it [according] to the number הַיָּמִים֙ <S%H3117><s%> of the days אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> after תִּשְׁכַּ֣ב <S%H7901><s%> that thou shalt lie עָלָ֔יו <S%H5921><s%> on תִּשָּׂ֖א <S%H5375><s%> upon it thou shalt bear אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֲוֹנָֽם׃ <S%H5771><s%> their iniquity

וַאֲנִ֗י <S%H589><s%> I נָתַ֤תִּֽי <S%H5414><s%> For I have laid לְךָ֙ אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שְׁנֵ֣י <S%H8141><s%> upon thee the years עֲוֹנָ֔ם <S%H5771><s%> of their iniquity לְמִסְפַּ֣ר <S%H4557><s%> according to the number יָמִ֔ים <S%H3117><s%> of the days שְׁלֹשׁ־ <S%H7969><s%> three מֵא֥וֹת <S%H3967><s%> hundred וְתִשְׁעִ֖ים <S%H8673><s%> and ninety י֑וֹם <S%H3117><s%> days וְנָשָׂ֖אתָ <S%H5375><s%> so shalt thou bear עֲוֹ֥ן <S%H5771><s%> the iniquity בֵּֽית־ <S%H1004><s%> of the house יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel

וְכִלִּיתָ֣ <S%H3615><s%> And when thou hast accomplished אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֵ֗לֶּה <S%H428><s%> them וְשָׁ֨כַבְתָּ֜ <S%H7901><s%> lie עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and צִדְּךָ֤ <S%H6654><s%> side [הַיְמֹונִי כ] (הַיְמָנִי֙ <S%H3227><s%> right ק) שֵׁנִ֔ית <S%H8145><s%> again וְנָשָׂ֖אתָ <S%H5375><s%> and thou shalt bear אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֲוֹ֣ן <S%H5771><s%> the iniquity בֵּית־ <S%H1004><s%> of the house יְהוּדָ֑ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah אַרְבָּעִ֣ים <S%H705><s%> forty י֔וֹם <S%H3117><s%> days י֧וֹם <S%H3117><s%> A day לַשָּׁנָ֛ה <S%H8141><s%> year י֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> days לַשָּׁנָ֖ה <S%H8141><s%> year נְתַתִּ֥יו <S%H5414><s%> I have appointed לָֽךְ׃

וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> toward מְצ֤וֹר <S%H4692><s%> toward the siege יְרוּשָׁלִַ֙ם֙ <S%H3389><s%> of Jerusalem תָּכִ֣ין <S%H3559><s%> Therefore thou shalt set פָּנֶ֔יךָ <S%H6440><s%> thy face וּֽזְרֹעֲךָ֖ <S%H2220><s%> and thine arm חֲשׂוּפָ֑ה <S%H2834><s%> [shall be] uncovered וְנִבֵּאתָ֖ <S%H5012><s%> and thou shalt prophesy עָלֶֽיהָ׃ <S%H5921><s%> against

וְהִנֵּ֛ה <S%H2009><s%> now behold נָתַ֥תִּי <S%H5414><s%> And behold I will lay עָלֶ֖יךָ <S%H5921><s%> and עֲבוֹתִ֑ים <S%H5688><s%> bands וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> you cannot תֵהָפֵ֤ךְ <S%H2015><s%> upon thee and thou shalt not turn מִֽצִּדְּךָ֙ <S%H6654><s%> thee from one side אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to צִדֶּ֔ךָ <S%H6654><s%> to another עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> until כַּלּוֹתְךָ֖ <S%H3615><s%> till thou hast ended יְמֵ֥י <S%H3117><s%> the days מְצוּרֶֽךָ׃ <S%H4692><s%> of thy siege

וְאַתָּ֣ה <S%H859><s%> you קַח־ <S%H3947><s%> Take לְךָ֡ חִטִּ֡ין <S%H2406><s%> thou also unto thee wheat וּ֠שְׂעֹרִים <S%H8184><s%> and barley וּפ֨וֹל <S%H6321><s%> and beans וַעֲדָשִׁ֜ים <S%H5742><s%> and lentiles וְדֹ֣חַן <S%H1764><s%> and millet וְכֻסְּמִ֗ים <S%H3698><s%> and fitches וְנָתַתָּ֤ה <S%H5414><s%> and put אוֹתָם֙ <S%H853><s%> בִּכְלִ֣י <S%H3627><s%> vessel אֶחָ֔ד <S%H259><s%> them in one וְעָשִׂ֧יתָ <S%H6213><s%> and make אוֹתָ֛ם <S%H853><s%> לְךָ֖ לְלָ֑חֶם <S%H3899><s%> thee bread מִסְפַּ֨ר <S%H4557><s%> thereof [according] to the number הַיָּמִ֜ים <S%H3117><s%> of the days אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after אַתָּ֣ה ׀ <S%H859><s%> you שׁוֹכֵ֣ב <S%H7901><s%> that thou shalt lie עַֽל־ <S%H5921><s%> on צִדְּךָ֗ <S%H6654><s%> upon thy side שְׁלֹשׁ־ <S%H7969><s%> three מֵא֧וֹת <S%H3967><s%> hundred וְתִשְׁעִ֛ים <S%H8673><s%> and ninety י֖וֹם <S%H3117><s%> days תֹּאכֲלֶֽנּוּ׃ <S%H398><s%> shalt thou eat

וּמַאֲכָֽלְךָ֙ <S%H3978><s%> And thy meat אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which תֹּאכֲלֶ֔נּוּ <S%H398><s%> which thou shalt eat בְּמִשְׁק֕וֹל <S%H4946><s%> [shall be] by weight עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <S%H6242><s%> twenty שֶׁ֖קֶל <S%H8255><s%> shekels לַיּ֑וֹם <S%H3117><s%> a day מֵעֵ֥ת <S%H6256><s%> from time עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against עֵ֖ת <S%H6256><s%> to time תֹּאכֲלֶֽנּוּ׃ <S%H398><s%> shalt thou eat

וּמַ֛יִם <S%H4325><s%> also water בִּמְשׂוּרָ֥ה <S%H4884><s%> by measure תִשְׁתֶּ֖ה <S%H8354><s%> Thou shalt drink שִׁשִּׁ֣ית <S%H8345><s%> the sixth part הַהִ֑ין <S%H1969><s%> of an hin מֵעֵ֥ת <S%H6256><s%> from time עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against עֵ֖ת <S%H6256><s%> to time תִּשְׁתֶּֽה׃ <S%H8354><s%> shalt thou drink

וְעֻגַ֥ת <S%H5692><s%> cakes שְׂעֹרִ֖ים <S%H8184><s%> it [as] barley תֹּֽאכֲלֶ֑נָּה <S%H398><s%> And thou shalt eat וְהִ֗יא <S%H1931><s%> he בְּגֶֽלְלֵי֙ <S%H1561><s%> it with dung צֵאַ֣ת <S%H6627><s%> that cometh out הָֽאָדָ֔ם <S%H120><s%> of man תְּעֻגֶ֖נָה <S%H5746><s%> and thou shalt bake לְעֵינֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H5869><s%> in their sight ס

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD כָּ֣כָה <S%H3602><s%> Thus יֹאכְל֧וּ <S%H398><s%> eat בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> Even thus shall the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> לַחְמָ֖ם <S%H3899><s%> bread טָמֵ֑א <S%H2931><s%> their defiled בַּגּוֹיִ֕ם <S%H1471><s%> among the Gentiles אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> I אַדִּיחֵ֖ם <S%H5080><s%> whither I will drive שָֽׁם׃ <S%H8033><s%> in it

וָאֹמַ֗ר <S%H559><s%> Then said אֲהָהּ֙ <S%H162><s%> I Ah אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> Lord יְהוִ֔ה <S%H3069><s%> GOD הִנֵּ֥ה <S%H2009><s%> Behold נַפְשִׁ֖י <S%H5315><s%> behold my soul לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> have never מְטֻמָּאָ֑ה <S%H2930><s%> hath not been polluted וּנְבֵלָ֨ה <S%H5038><s%> of that which dieth of itself וּטְרֵפָ֤ה <S%H2966><s%> or is torn in pieces לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> have never אָכַ֙לְתִּי֙ <S%H398><s%> up even till now have I not eaten מִנְּעוּרַ֣י <S%H5271><s%> for from my youth וְעַד־ <S%H5704><s%> until עַ֔תָּה <S%H6258><s%> now וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> nor בָ֥א <S%H935><s%> neither came בְּפִ֖י <S%H6310><s%> into my mouth בְּשַׂ֥ר <S%H1320><s%> flesh פִּגּֽוּל׃ <S%H6292><s%> there abominable ס

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> Then he said אֵלַ֔י <S%H413><s%> to me רְאֵ֗ה <S%H7200><s%> unto me Lo נָתַ֤תִּֽי <S%H5414><s%> I have given לְךָ֙ אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> [צְפוּעֵי כ] (צְפִיעֵ֣י <S%H6832><s%> dung ק) הַבָּקָ֔ר <S%H1241><s%> thee cow's תַּ֖חַת <S%H8478><s%> place גֶּלְלֵ֣י <S%H1561><s%> dung הָֽאָדָ֑ם <S%H120><s%> for man's וְעָשִׂ֥יתָ <S%H6213><s%> and thou shalt prepare אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> לַחְמְךָ֖ <S%H3899><s%> thy bread עֲלֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H5921><s%> over ס

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> Moreover he said אֵלַ֗י <S%H413><s%> to me בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> unto me Son אָדָם֙ <S%H120><s%> of man הִנְנִ֨י <S%H2005><s%> I am going שֹׁבֵ֤ר <S%H7665><s%> behold I will break מַטֵּה־ <S%H4294><s%> the staff לֶ֙חֶם֙ <S%H3899><s%> of bread בִּיר֣וּשָׁלִַ֔ם <S%H3389><s%> in Jerusalem וְאָכְלוּ־ <S%H398><s%> and they shall eat לֶ֥חֶם <S%H3899><s%> bread בְּמִשְׁקָ֖ל <S%H4948><s%> by weight וּבִדְאָגָ֑ה <S%H1674><s%> and with care וּמַ֕יִם <S%H4325><s%> water בִּמְשׂוּרָ֥ה <S%H4884><s%> by measure וּבְשִׁמָּמ֖וֹן <S%H8078><s%> and with astonishment יִשְׁתּֽוּ׃ <S%H8354><s%> and they shall drink

לְמַ֥עַן <S%H4616><s%> because יַחְסְר֖וּ <S%H2637><s%> That they may want לֶ֣חֶם <S%H3899><s%> bread וָמָ֑יִם <S%H4325><s%> and water וְנָשַׁ֙מּוּ֙ <S%H8074><s%> and be astonied אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> one וְאָחִ֔יו <S%H251><s%> with another וְנָמַ֖קּוּ <S%H4743><s%> and consume away בַּעֲוֹנָֽם׃ <S%H5771><s%> for their iniquity פ
